name: GestIT
body:
---
GestIT JavaScript demos
---

# GestIT JavaScript demos

* [Draw+Pinch and Zoom](JavaScript/demo/SmartPaint.html)

# Demo components

* [Show the trajectory of each touch](JavaScript/demo/UnboundTouch.html)
* [Show the touches and a pinch](JavaScript/demo/UnboundTouchWithNaivePinchAndZoom.html)
* [Show the touches and reuse a generic pinch gesture](JavaScript/demo/UnboundTouchWithNaivePinchAndZoom.html)
* [Test the pinch and zoom gesture](JavaScript/demo/PinchAndZoom.html)

# Utilities to test & debug multi-touch

* [Multi-touch](JavaScript/test/multi.html)
* [Drag and Drop](JavaScript/test/testDragAndDrop.html)

---
GestIT F# tutorials
---

On [TryF#](http://www.tryfsharp.org/) are available F# examples of the native version of GestIT:

* [Drag and drop using GestIT](http://www.tryfsharp.org/create/cisterni/GestIT/tutorial/DragAndDrop.fsx)
